text: The 1989–90 Washington Capitals season was the Washington Capitals 16th season in the National Hockey League (NHL). The team reached the Prince of Wales Conference Finals for the first time, losing to the Bruins 4 games to 0. ==Offseason== ===NHL Draft=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="background:#ddf;
